meanings.definition: Showing a strong desire for sexual activity.
meanings.sent1: The randier cat kept following the other cats around.
meanings.sent2: She felt randier than usual after watching the romantic movie.
meanings.sent3: The randier squirrel was chasing after every nut in the park.
meanings.sent4: The randier flames of passion burned brightly between the two lovers.
meanings.sent5: His randier behavior at the party made everyone uncomfortable.

meanings.definition: More sexually aroused or excited than usual.
meanings.sent1: The randier puppy was humping everything in sight.
meanings.sent2: After the romantic dinner, she felt randier than ever before.
meanings.sent3: The randier monkey was swinging from tree to tree with extra enthusiasm.
meanings.sent4: The randier atmosphere in the room was palpable.
meanings.sent5: His randier thoughts kept him up all night.
